segments.text: Oh , well . It was fun to be the winner . But ... it's too big . I must be an extra small in the States .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what about the tennis racket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look ! It's amazing . I can't wait to try it out !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much did that end up costing you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ... around twenty bucks . A bargain if you ask me . Look at the picture of her playing with it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , two for one . That's a super deal .
segments.speaker: S2
